items.name: Bubonic Trail
explicitMods: Triggers Level 20 Death Walk when Equipped
52% reduced Duration of Elemental Ailments on You while affected by a Rare Abyss Jewel
30% increased Movement Speed while affected by a Magic Abyss Jewel
23% increased Reservation Efficiency of Skills while affected by a Unique Abyss Jewel
flavourText: Even the dead serve the Lightless.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Applies a buff which can take some of the damage from hits for you before being depleted. Shares a cooldown with other Guard skills.
explicitMods: This Skill's Cooldown does not recover during its effect

70% of Damage from Hits is taken from the Buff before Life or Energy Shield
Buff can take 2209 Damage
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that grants mana regeneration to you and your allies.
explicitMods: You and nearby Allies Regenerate 25 Mana per second
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Place a Frost Shield that drains your energy shield for one second or until you run out, gaining stages while this drain occurs. The Frost Shield takes some damage from hits in place of you and allies while in its area. Enemies in the area are Chilled. You can only have one Frost Shield active at once.
explicitMods: 20% of Damage dealt to you or Allies in Area with Hits by Enemies in Area is taken from Frost Shield's Life before your Life or Energy Shield
60% of Damage dealt to you or Allies in Area with Hits by Enemies outside Area is taken from Frost Shield's Life before your Life or Energy Shield
You gain +0.32% to Spell Critical Strike Chance per Stage while in Area
Frost Shield has 690 maximum Life per Stage
Gains 1 Stage every 0.3 seconds while you are losing Energy Shield
You lose 550 Energy Shield per second
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.name: Ulaman's Gaze
explicitMods:
Projectiles have 4% chance to be able to Chain when colliding with terrain per
Searching Eye Jewel affecting you, up to a maximum of 20%
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an Abyssal Socket on an Item or into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.
flavourText: The Sovereign of the Well seeks dominion over the light.

items.name: Vaal Caress
explicitMods: +5 to Level of Socketed Vaal Gems
-5 to Level of Socketed Non-Vaal Gems
You gain Onslaught for 20 seconds on using a Vaal Skill
flavourText: "The gems are strangely human at times.
They simply love to be held."
- Doryani, First Seer to the Queen

socketedItems.secDescrText: Charges at a targeted location or enemy, pushing away enemies in your path and repeatedly dealing off-hand damage in a small area in front of you. socketedItems.secDescrText: Casting once reserves mana to carry a banner which increases the armour and evasion of nearby allies, and reduces the critical strike chance of nearby enemies. Gains stages over time while carrying the banner near enemies. Casting the skill again places the banner, ending the mana reservation. Once placed, it becomes more powerful for each stage gained. You cannot have multiple banners at the same time.
